items.content_html: `preact-lazy-load` is a lightweight library for implementing lazy loading in Preact applications. It includes components for lazy loading images, iframes, and background images, with fallback support for older browsers.
items.title: jameswquinn/preact-lazy-load: `preact-lazy-load` is a lightweight library for implementing lazy loading in Preact applications. It includes components for lazy loading images, iframes, and background images, with fallback support for older browsers.
